answer.explanation: Hello, everyone. Q1 I’d like to announce a few changes in our procedure that are designed to save us money. Firstly, we will no longer be sending statements to clients through the post. We’ll be using e-mail to send monthly statements. Q2 It is a simple procedure, and when the software is Installed I don’t think you will need any training. The system is very straightforward. We are also renting out the catering room and installing some refrigerators in the cafeteria, Q3 so you will have to start bringing your own lunches to work.

question.text: According to the speaker, why are changes being made?
choices: (C) So that they can afford a Christmas party

question.text: What does the speaker imply when he says, “when the software is installed I don’t think you will need any training”?
choices: (A) The new system is easy to learn.
(B) He doesn’t want to train people.
(C) There is no budget for training.

answer.text: (A) The new system is easy to learn.

question.text: What does the speaker tell the listeners they will have to start bringing to work?

answer.explanation: OK everybody, thank you for coming in. Q1 I received the statistics for this year’s software market shares. Although we are still in the top four companies, we need to work harder. Q2 Slight Line Inc. has just moved past US by three percent one year. We were much bigger than them last year. Analysts are suggesting that Slight Line’s success is because they give away a lot of free software updates after people buy their games. Q3 In the next quarter, we are going to begin to offer all of our expansion packs for free download. I think this can give us the edge we need and help us get back about Slight Line Inc.

answer.explanation: Hello everyone! Q1 Welcome to your first day at Valencia’s Culinary Training Center. For the rest of the week, each day will have a different theme relating to the most important aspects of working in a kitchen. Q2 We have some celebrity chef’s coming in who are highly skilled and I’m sure you will enjoy working with them. Script
M-Au: This is Harold Rosen, with WKRN News, Q1 reporting from the newly opened Bradford Opera House. The building is ultramodern, and when plans for its construction were announced, locals expressed their concern about it. It’s located right next to historic city hall, the oldest building in the city. But so far, residents who have visited seem to like it. In spite of its modern look, those who have been inside are impressed. The atrium is beautifully decorated, the theather is equipped with a state-of-the-art sound system, and, of course, the music program is specutacular. Q3 The schedule for this season’s performances can be found on the WKRN Web site.

answer.text: (C)A new building contrasts with older ones.
